author: rbb
msg: Remove an incorrect comment.  Bucket brigades are allocated out of pools,
if we drop one on the floor, it will get cleaned up when we clean the pool.

author: trawick
msg: when delivering body bytes, only deliver one block of data (however
much is returned by bucket read) instead of delivering the entire
body at once; this gets painful with a large body
make a note of an issue with the blocking state of the socket;
currently, the socket is non-blocking, but when reading body bytes
we should feel free to wait for body bytes until a timeout occurs;

author: rbb
msg: Remove some annoying warnings from http_protocol.  This is untested, but

author: wrowe
msg: Make things a little clearer in reaction to the _snames snafus.

author: wrowe
msg: Clarify description for ServerTokens (thanks Erwann), and the
ScriptInterpreterSource (couldn't help but notice an issue) directives.
